title: The Stand Off
description: "And what a delicious little obstacle she is." He would enjoy breaking through her stony exterior. He’d get that property one way or another, he always won… Lux would learn that quickly. She was no match for him; she would learn that as well.“I bet she f*cks as hard as she fights,” Dean thought to himself before grinning.Watching her cum would be amusing; watching her break when she changed her mind would be fun and watching her sign over the very building that she’d fought so hard to keep…would be exquisite.
author: Z. Stefani
